title: Manage Site Dust Control
description: On a windy day, the site is generating a lot of dust. The superintendent must implement dust control measures to comply with environmental regulations.

tasks.description: Identify the need for dust control due to high winds.
tasks.expected_outcome: The superintendent recognizes the compliance risk.

tasks.description: Dispatch the water truck to spray down all haul roads and exposed soil areas on the site.
tasks.expected_outcome: The water truck is deployed to mitigate the dust.

tasks.description: Log the dust control measures taken in the daily site log.
tasks.expected_outcome: The proactive compliance measure is documented.
